Data Architecture Hub
  • Cloud Platform
  • View page source

Cloud Platform

In Progress


The Data Architecture team will utilise cloud environments for various activities:

  • Conducting proof of concept/prototype examples of data tools to support organisations.

  • Develop and demonstrate innovative solutions to data challenges such as linkage.

  • Provide a blueprint and the foundations to productionise said tools and solutions.
